content: hair scrunchies are very popular fashion pieces these days this crochet easy lace scrunchie pattern is a very fun project to make and easy to crochet crochet easy lace scrunchie is perfect if you need to make a beautiful and quick item for you or for your friends this pattern works up really quickly and only uses a tiny bit of yarn so scrunchies are a great way to use up yarn scraps leftover from other projects they make great gifts for anyone who has long hair for my crochet easy lace scrunchie i ve used mercerised cotton a 3 mm hook and elastic hair hair ties
